TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PersonalizableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PersonalizableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PersonalizableAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示个性化特性。

span.span: Represents the personalization attribute.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 个性化设置属性， `Personalizable`，应用于需要保存个性化设置信息的公共控件属性。The personalization attribute, `Personalizable`, is applied to public control properties that need to persist personalization information. ASP.NET 自动生成代码，将存在，或者从基础数据存储区检索这些值，当控件在 Web 部件页的 Web 部件区域中。ASP.NET automatically generates the code to persist or retrieve these values from the underlying data store when the control is in a Web Parts zone on a Web Parts page. 要将标记为可个性化的属性，必须满足以下要求：The following requirements must be met for a property to be marked as personalizable: - 属性必须是公共的并且必须具有公共 get 和 set 访问器。The property must be public and must have public get and set accessors. - 该属性必须是读/写属性。The property must be a read/write property. - 该属性必须是不带参数。The property must be without parameters. - 该属性无法进行索引。The property cannot be indexed. 自动生成代码以加载和保存个性化设置数据属性。Code is automatically generated to load and save personalization data for properties. 支持个性化设置的属性确定基于存在此特性的属性和这一事实属性符合以上所列的约束。Properties that support personalization are determined based on the existence of this attribute on the property and the fact that the property conforms to the constraints listed above. 请注意，只读和只写属性不支持个性化。Note that read-only and write-only properties are not supported for personalization. 将此特性应用于只读或只写属性会导致所引发。Applying this attribute to a read-only or write-only property results in an being thrown. 参数化的属性也会引发异常。Parameterized properties also throw an exception. 如果通过任何特殊的处理，如果不使用此属性的各个属性不在个性化使用接口。Individual properties without this attribute are excluded from personalization if no special handling through the interface is used. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件个性化设置概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information about using attributes, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用代码中的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in code. 此示例包含一个.aspx 页面，引用名为 Web 部件用户控件`ColorSelector.ascx`。The sample consists of an .aspx page that references a Web Part user control called `ColorSelector.ascx`. 以下代码是示例.aspx 文件。The following code is the .aspx file for the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_SimplePersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_SimplePersonalization/CS/Default.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是为`ColorSelector.ascx`控件。The following code is for the `ColorSelector.ascx` control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_SimplePersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_SimplePersonalization/CS/ColorSelector.ascx#2)]

exception.span: 该属性是只读或只写的公共属性。

span.span: The property is a read-only or write-only public property.
\- or -

exception.span: 该属性是私有的或受保护的读/写属性。

span.span: The property is a private or protected read/write property.
\- or -
The property has index parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在内部设置属性的布尔型参数，值属性设置为，和属性设置为`false`。This constructor internally sets the property to the value of the Boolean parameter, the property to , and the property to `false`. 此构造函数是很有用，如果你想要将标记为可个性化设置为不可个性化派生类型的基类型上的虚拟属性的派生的类型。This constructor is useful if you want a derived type to mark a virtual property that is personalizable on the base type as not-personalizable on the derived type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ICollection GetPersonalizableProperties(class System.Type type) cil managed

param.name: type
param.span: 要在其上查找 属性的类型。

span.span: The type on which to look for properties.

summary.span: 返回特定属性的 对象的集合，这些属性与此参数类型匹配并标记为可个性化。

span.span: Returns a collection of objects for the properties that match the parameter type and are marked as personalizable.
An of personalizable properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回包含零个或更多的集合对象，其中的每个属性，它是指定的类型的集合中的一个对象标记为可个性化，其中等于`true`。This method returns a collection containing zero or more objects, with one object in the collection for each property of the type specified that is marked as being personalizable, where equals `true`. `type`参数的类型在其上查找`Personalizable`属性。The `type` parameter is the type on which to look for `Personalizable` properties. 例如，您需要传入`"typeof(MyWebPart)"`若要获取`Personalizable`上的属性`MyWebPart`类。For example, you would pass in `"typeof(MyWebPart)"` to get the `Personalizable` properties on the `MyWebPart` class.

exception.span: 该类型上的公共属性被标记为可个性化，但为只读的。

span.span: A public property on the type is marked as personalizable but is read-only.
